wisdom.sentence: A couple of kids tried using pickles instead of paddles for a Ping-Pong game.  They had the volley of the Dills.
A farm in the country side had several turkeys, it was known as the house of seven gobbles.
A gourmet who thinks of calories is like a tart that looks at her watch.
wisdom.author: James Beard

wisdom.sentence: A new chef from India was fired a week after starting the job.He kept favoring curry.
A waist is a terrible thing to mind.
wisdom.author: Ziggy

wisdom.sentence: A wife started serving chopped meat, Monday hamburger, Tuesday meat loaf, Wednesday tartar steak, and Thursday meatballs.  On Friday morning her husband snarled, "How now, ground cow?"
Actually, my goal is to have a sandwich named after me.
"And what will you do when you grow up to be as big as me?" asked the father of his little son. "Diet."
Anything is good if it's made of chocolate.
Anything that is good and useful is made of chocolate.
As he had feared, his orders had been forgotten and everyone had brought the potato salad.
Be careful when you bite into your hamburger.
wisdom.author: Derek Bok

wisdom.sentence: BOO!  We changed Coke again!  BLEAH!  BLEAH!
Boycott meat -- suck your thumb.
Carob works on the principle that, when mixed with the right combination of fats and sugar, it can duplicate chocolate in color and texture.  Of course, the same can be said of dirt.
Cheese -- milk's leap toward immortality.
wisdom.author: Clifton Fadiman, "Any Number Can Play"

wisdom.sentence: Chinese saying: "He who speak with forked tongue, not need chopsticks."
Death before dishonor.But neither before breakfast.
Dieters live life in the fasting lane.
Dinner is ready when the smoke alarm goes off.
Do not drink coffee in early A.M.  It will keep you awake until noon.
Do not worry about which side your bread is buttered on: you eat BOTH sides.
Eat as much as you like -- just don't swallow it.
wisdom.author: Harry Secombe's diet

wisdom.sentence: Eat drink and be merry! Tommorrow you may be in Utah.
Eat drink and be merry, for tomorrow they may make it illegal.
Eat drink and be merry, for tomorrow we diet.
Eat right, stay fit, and die anyway.
"Eat, drink, and be merry, for tomorrow you may work."
Eating chocolate is like being in love without the aggravation.
Even a blind pig stumbles upon a few acorns.
Even a cabbage may look at a king.
Every time I lose weight, it finds me again!
Everything I like is either illegal, immoral or fattening.
wisdom.author: Alexander Woollcott

wisdom.sentence: Everything is worth precisely as much as a belch, the difference being that a belch is more satisfying.
wisdom.author: Ingmar Bergman

wisdom.sentence: Fat Liberation: because a waist is a terrible thing to mind.
Fat people of the world unite, we've got nothing to lose!
Food for thought is no substitute for the real thing.
wisdom.author: Walt Kelly, "Potluck Pogo"

wisdom.sentence: God must have loved calories, she made so many of them.
GREAT MOMENTS IN HISTORY (#7):November 23, 1915  Pancake make-up is invented; most people continue to prefer syrup.
Has anyone ever tasted an "end"?  Are they really bitter?
Have a taco.
wisdom.author: P.S. Beagle

wisdom.sentence: Home on the Range was originally written in beef-flat.
Hors d'oeuvres -- a ham sandwich cut into forty pieces.
wisdom.author: Jack Benny

wisdom.sentence: I am so optimistic about beef prices that I've just leased a pot roast with an option to buy.
I brake for chezlogs!
I couldn't remember when I had been so disappointed.  Except perhaps the time I found out that M&Ms really DO melt in your hand.
wisdom.author: Peter Oakley

wisdom.sentence: I don't care for the Sugar Smacks commercial.  I don't like the idea of a frog jumping on my Breakfast.
wisdom.author: Lowell, Chicago Reader 10/15/82

wisdom.sentence: I don't care where I sit as long as I get fed.
wisdom.author: Calvin Trillin

wisdom.sentence: I don't even butter my bread.  I consider that cooking.
wisdom.author: Katherine Cebrian

wisdom.sentence: I don't have an eating problem. I eat. I get fat.  I buy new clothes. No problem.
"I don't like spinach, and I'm glad I don't, because if I liked it I'd eat it, and I just hate it."
wisdom.author: Clarence Darrow

wisdom.sentence: I have never been one to sacrifice my appetite on the altar of appearance.
wisdom.author: A.M. Readyhough

wisdom.sentence: I have no doubt that it is a part of the destiny of the human race,  in its gradual improvement, to leave off eating animals.
wisdom.author: Thoreau

wisdom.sentence: I just ate a whole package of Sweet Tarts and a can of Coke. I think I saw God.
wisdom.author: B. Hathrume Duk

wisdom.sentence: I never met a piece of chocolate I didn't like.
I never pray before meals -- my mom's a good cook.
"I thought you were trying to get into shape." "I am. The shape I've selected is a triangle."
I'm hungry, time to eat lunch.
I've been on a diet for two weeks and all I've lost is two weeks.
wisdom.author: Totie Fields

wisdom.sentence: If at first you fricasee, fry, fry again.
If food be the music of love, eat up, eat up.
If puns were deli meat, this would be the wurst.
If you are what you eat, does that mean Euell Gibbons really was a nut?
If you put your supper dish to your ear you can hear the sounds of a restaurant.
wisdom.author: Snoopy

wisdom.sentence: If you see an onion ring -- answer it!
If you stew apples like cranberries, they taste more like prunes than rhubarb does.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx

wisdom.sentence: If you waste your time cooking, you'll miss the next meal.
If you're going to America, bring your own food.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz, "Social Studies"

wisdom.sentence: If your bread is stale, make toast.
In Mexico we have a word for sushi: bait.
wisdom.author: Josi Simon

wisdom.sentence: Is there life before breakfast?
It is a hard matter, my fellow citizens, to argue with the belly, since it has no ears.
wisdom.author: Marcus Porcius Cato

wisdom.sentence: It was a brave man that ate the first oyster.
It's raisins that make Post Raisin Bran so raisiny ...
It's so beautifully arranged on the plate -- you know someone's fingers have been all over it.
wisdom.author: Julia Child on nouvelle cuisine.

wisdom.sentence: Killing turkeys causes winter.
Kissing don't last, cookery do.
wisdom.author: George Meredith

wisdom.sentence: Kitchen activity is highlighted.  Butter up a friend.
Last night I dreamed I ate a ten-pound marshmallow, and when I woke up the pillow was gone.
wisdom.author: Tommy Cooper

wisdom.sentence: Last week's pet, this week's special.
Let not the sands of time get in your lunch.
Life is like a bowl of soup with hairs floating on it.You have to eat it nevertheless.
wisdom.author: Flaubert

wisdom.sentence: "Life is like a buffet; it's not good but there's plenty of it."
Life is like a tin of sardines. We're, all of us, looking for the key.
wisdom.author: Beyond the Fringe

wisdom.sentence: Life is like an egg stain on your chin -- you can lick it, but it still won't go away.
Life is like an onion: you peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
wisdom.author: Carl Sandburg

wisdom.sentence: Life is like an onion: you peel off layer after layer and then you find there is nothing in it.
wisdom.author: James Huneker

wisdom.sentence: Life is too short to stuff a mushroom.
wisdom.author: Storm Jameson

wisdom.sentence: Life without caffeine is stimulating enough.
wisdom.author: Sanka Ad

wisdom.sentence: Living here in Rio, I have lots of coffees to choose from.  And when you're on the lam like me, you appreciate a good cup of coffee.
wisdom.author: "Great Train Robber" Ronald Biggs' coffee commercial

wisdom.sentence: Man who arrives at party two hours late will find he has been beaten to the punch.
Most people eat as though they were fattening themselves for market.
wisdom.author: E.W. Howe

wisdom.sentence: Mountain Dew and doughnuts...  because breakfast is the most important meal of the day.
My doctor told me to stop having intimate dinners for four.  Unless there are three other people.
wisdom.author: Orson Welles

wisdom.sentence: My favorite sandwich is peanut butter, baloney, cheddar cheese, lettuce and mayonnaise on toasted bread with catsup on the side.
wisdom.author: Senator Hubert Humphrey

wisdom.sentence: My weight is perfect for my height -- which varies.
Never eat anything bigger than your head.
Never eat more than you can lift.
wisdom.author: Miss Piggy

wisdom.sentence: No man in the world has more courage than the man who can stop after eating one peanut.
wisdom.author: Channing Pollock

wisdom.sentence: Nothing takes the taste out of peanut butter quite like unrequited love.
wisdom.author: Charlie Brown

wisdom.sentence: Pete:Waiter, this meat is bad. Waiter: Who told you? Pete:A little swallow.
Peter's hungry, time to eat lunch.
Preserve wildlife -- pickle a squirrel today!
Prunes give you a run for your money.
Put cats in the coffee and mice in the tea!
Remember, DESSERT is spelled with two `s's while DESERT is spelled with one, because EVERYONE wants two desserts, but NO ONE wants two deserts.
wisdom.author: Miss Oglethorp, Gr. 5, PS. 59

wisdom.sentence: Sacred cows make great hamburgers.
Save gas, don't eat beans.
Seeing is deceiving.  It's eating that's believing.
wisdom.author: James Thurber

wisdom.sentence: So much food; so little time!
Some circumstantial evidence is very strong, as when you find a trout in the milk.
wisdom.author: Thoreau

wisdom.sentence: The chicken that clucks the loudest is the one most likely to show up at the steam fitters' picnic.
The cow is nothing but a machine which makes grass fit for us people to eat.
wisdom.author: John McNulty

wisdom.sentence: The early bird gets the coffee left over from the night before.
The most remarkable thing about my mother is that for thirty years she served the family nothing but leftovers.  The original meal has never been found.
wisdom.author: Calvin Trillin

wisdom.sentence: "The National Association of Theater Concessionaires reported that in 1986, 60%  of all candy sold in movie theaters was sold to Roger Ebert."
wisdom.author: D. Letterman

wisdom.sentence: The number of feet in a yard is directly proportional to the success of the barbecue.
The number of licorice gumballs you get out of a gumball machine increases in direct proportion to how much you hate licorice.
The only thing better than love is milk.
The trouble with eating Italian food is that five or six days later you're hungry again.
wisdom.author: George Miller

wisdom.sentence: The way to a man's stomach is through his esophagus.
There are times when truth is stranger than fiction and lunch time is one of them.
There are twenty-five people left in the world, and twenty-seven of them are hamburgers.
wisdom.author: Ed Sanders

wisdom.sentence: There is more simplicity in the man who eats caviar on impulse than in the man who eats Grape-Nuts on principle.
wisdom.author: G.K. Chesterton

wisdom.sentence: There is no sincerer love than the love of food.
wisdom.author: George Bernard Shaw

wisdom.sentence: There's always free cheese in a mousetrap.
There's nothing like the face of a kid eating a Hershey bar.
Thirteen at a table is unlucky only when the hostess has only twelve chops.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx

wisdom.sentence: This is Betty Frenel.  I don't know who to call but I can't reach my Food-a-holics partner.I'm at Vido's on my second pizza with sausage and mushroom.  Jim, come and get me!
This is National Non-Dairy Creamer Week.
Tom's hungry, time to eat lunch.
Two peanuts were walking through the New York.One was assaulted.
Vegeterians beware!  You are what you eat.
Wake up and smell the coffee.
wisdom.author: Ann Landers

wisdom.sentence: What foods these morsels be!
What is food to one, is to others bitter poison.
wisdom.author: Titus Lucretius Carus

wisdom.sentence: When a person goes on a diet, the first thing he loses is his temper.
When all else fails, EAT!!!
When my brain begins to reel from my literary labors, I make an occasional cheese dip.
wisdom.author: Ignatius Reilly

wisdom.sentence: When you're dining out and you suspect something's wrong, you're probably right.
Where do you go to get anorexia?
wisdom.author: Shelley Winters

wisdom.sentence: While it may be true that a watched pot never boils, the one you don't keep an eye on can make an awful mess of your stove.
wisdom.author: Edward Stevenson

wisdom.sentence: Whoever tells a lie cannot be pure in heart -- and only the pure in heart can make a good soup.
wisdom.author: Ludwig Van Beethoven

wisdom.sentence: Why do so many foods come packaged in plastic?It's quite uncanny.
Why do they call a fast a fast, when it goes so slow?
Without ice cream life and fame are meaningless.
You don't sew with a fork, so I see no reason to eat with knitting needles.
wisdom.author: Miss Piggy, on eating Chinese Food

wisdom.sentence: You first parents of the human race... who ruined yourself for an apple, what might you have done for a truffled turkey?
wisdom.author: Brillat-savarin, "Physiologie du Gout"

wisdom.sentence: You know you have a small apartment when Rice Krispies echo.
wisdom.author: S. Rickly Christian

wisdom.sentence: You know you're a little fat if you have stretch marks on your car.
wisdom.author: Cyrus, Chicago Reader 1/22/82

wisdom.sentence: You must dine in our cafeteria. You can eat dirt cheap there!!!!
